org.apache.batik.css.engine.value.svg12

Class LineHeightManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.batik.css.engine.value.AbstractValueFactory
      • org.apache.batik.css.engine.value.AbstractValueManager
        • org.apache.batik.css.engine.value.LengthManager
          • org.apache.batik.css.engine.value.svg12.LineHeightManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ValueManager

    public class LineHeightManager
extends LengthManager
    This class provides a factory for the 'margin-*' properties values.
